name: Cube Invaders
description:
The cube planet is being attacked! Destroy enemy waves building powerful turrets and then rotate the planet to move them, but be careful not to leave a face uncovered!

Keep an eye on the radars to know where the enemies are coming.

Every biome has a different turret, so choose wisely which to and not to build.

Features:

-A rotating planet: rotate its rows and columns as much as you like, but beware to not make any unnecessary movements.

-5 different biomes, each with a unique turret.

-Radar tiles to see the enemies coming.

-3 different enemies… and more to come!

DEVELOPED BY:

QWACK GAMES TEAM (EVENT HORIZON SCHOOL MILAN, YEAR 1, 2019/2020)
